doc:
Ted Bessell https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ted_Bessell 0 Howard Weston "Ted" Bessell Jr. (March 20, 1935 – October 6, 1996) was an American television actor and director. He is best known for his role as Donald Hollinger, the boyfriend and eventual fiancé of Marlo Thomas's character in the TV series That Girl (1966–71). Howard_Weston_"_Ted_"_Bessell_Jr. ( March_20_,_1935 – October_6_,_1996 ) was an_American_television_actor_and_director . He is_best_known for his_role as Donald_Hollinger , the_boyfriend_and_eventual_fiancé of Marlo_Thomas 's_character in the_TV_series_That Girl_(_1966 – 71_) .
